thread.section_title: Asia Highlights Travel 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Asia Highlights Travel 的点评意见 | asiahighlights.com
thread.title: Anitha Maharaj
thread.title_full: Asia Highlights Travel 的点评人 Anitha Maharaj

author: Anitha Maharaj
title: Anitha Maharaj
text:
We used China Highlights during January 17. The guides they had used were all professional in their fields. My wife and I visited Guangzhou and Shanghai. The above company provided all our transfers and tours and some of our accommodation. The drivers were patient and drove safely at all times. The guides had vast knowledge of the cities and it's history. The transport was always on time and more importantly were always visible at the airports and harbour we used.
Albee Ning provided us with all the information we required in China. It was important to have a tour company as the language barrier was very visible in the cities.
The guides didn't waste our time by taking us shopping without our permission as we were on limited time.
